bkietz commented on pull request #4707: ARROW-4788: [C++] Less verbose API for constructing StructArray
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4707#discussion_r297828933
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/array.cc
 ##########
 @@ -482,6 +482,34 @@ StructArray::StructArray(const std::shared_ptr<DataType>& type, int64_t length,
   boxed_fields_.resize(children.size());
 }
 
+Result<std::shared_ptr<Array>> StructArray::Make(
+    const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Array>>& children,
+    const std::vector<std::string>& field_names, std::shared_ptr<Buffer> null_bitmap,
 
 Review comment:
   As a side effect, this would make a having more field names than child arrays a compile-time error
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

bkietz commented on pull request #4707: ARROW-4788: [C++] Less verbose API for constructing StructArray
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4707#discussion_r297828694
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/array.cc
 ##########
 @@ -482,6 +482,34 @@ StructArray::StructArray(const std::shared_ptr<DataType>& type, int64_t length,
   boxed_fields_.resize(children.size());
 }
 
+Result<std::shared_ptr<Array>> StructArray::Make(
+    const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Array>>& children,
+    const std::vector<std::string>& field_names, std::shared_ptr<Buffer> null_bitmap,
 
 Review comment:
   I think it would be better to make the association between field names and child arrays more clear in the arguments:
   
   ```suggestion
       const std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::shared_ptr<Array>>>& children,
       std::shared_ptr<Buffer> null_bitmap,
   ```
   
   This would allow usage like:
   ```c++
   auto s = StructArray::Make({{"a", a}, {"b", b}});
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

               std::shared_ptr<Buffer> null_bitmap = NULLPTR,
               int64_t null_count = kUnknownNullCount, int64_t offset = 0);
 
+  // This factory function automatically infers the length and data type
 
 Review comment:
   ```suggestion
     /// \brief Returns a new StructArray with inferred length and data type
   ```
